description: "This late 18th century map features a number of labels describing the local populations, including the Kemoys ('Savage People') of the mountains of Cokin China (Vietnam), the Biayos of Borneo, and the 'Wild People' of the mountains of Pegu (Myanmar)."
label: "Asia and its islands according to D'Anville : divided into empires, kingdoms, states, regions, &ca. : with the European possessions and settlements in the East Indies and an exact delineation of all the discoveries made in the Eastern parts by the English under Captn. Cook"
